quotes.quote: I feel like I have a new life and I'm going to take full advantage of it.
Everyone thinks that a new place or a new identity will jumpstart a new life.
The responsibility of carrying and bringing a new life into this world is one that cannot be taken lightly.
Everybody deserves a second chance in this world. That's basically all I ask.
Joining a new church and starting a new life is never easy and often frightening.
Rather than turning the page, it's much easier to just throw the book away.
If you want a new life, first give praise for having the old one!
Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.
The beginning of compunction is the beginning of a new life.
I've got a new life now, a new future, there's a lot more to Lennox Lewis than just being a boxer.
You never begin a new life. It's a mistake to think that you end one part of your life and start another as if there's no continuity.
The question is what I wanted to do with the new life God has given me. This is the mission I want to take on.
They'll never forget, never forgive, no matter who the enemy is, son. Better just to start a new life. Be someone else.
When everything is lost, and all seems darkness, then comes the new life and all that is needed.
Don't hold together what must fall apart. The familiar life crumbles so the new life can begin.
Perhaps there are just some things you leave behind when you choose a new life.
A lasting solution, the possibility to begin a new life, is the only dignified solution for the refugee himself.
Knowing when it is over is the beginning of a new life and the end of an old one!
No one can begin a new life, unless he repent of the old.
What's old collapses, times change, and new life blossoms in the ruins.
We're given second chances every day of our life. We don't usually take them, but they're there for the taking.
A new life? There's not such thing.It was only in the magazine headlines that people got a new life. Stopped drinking or taking drugs, found a new love. But the same life.
Today I begin a new life for I am the master of my abilities and today is going to be a great and beautiful day!
I used to believe that people are only born once, but now I feel I have been reborn, like I was given a new life. I see myself as a child, full of energy and hope.
You make a new life by making new choices.
We are continuously living a new life, and when the old and the new do not fit nicely together, the old - no longer able to contain the new - should be discarded.
What else remains for me? Youth, hope and love; To build a new life on a ruined life.
These, by obtruding the beginning of a change for the entire work of new life, will fall under the former guilt.
Your life changes the moment you make a new, congruent, and committed decision.
If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
